channel.title: Comments on: Scarlett Johansson just keeps getting hotter, I mean, cooler

item.title: By: Logan Young
item.dc:creator: Logan Young
item.description: it's a quarter 'til 3 and i have (had) a raging hard-on...thanks drawerb - you've soothed the savage beast. much better than going home with a fatty!
item.content:encoded: it’s a quarter ’til 3 and i have (had) a raging hard-on…thanks drawerb – you’ve soothed the savage beast. much better than going home with a fatty!

item.title: By: Eric Greenwood
item.dc:creator: Eric Greenwood
item.description:
"Scarlett Johansson-Langston is made of win"
gold.

item.title: By: K
item.dc:creator: K
item.description: I take back every horrible thing I said after viewing Ghost World 7 years ago. Mon Dieu!
item.content:encoded: I take back every horrible thing I said after viewing Ghost World 7 years ago. Mon Dieu!

item.title: By: Kevin Langston
item.dc:creator: Kevin Langston
item.description:
Could we be fapping at an elaborate airbrushing job?
Does it really matter?
Scarlett Johansson-Langston is made of win.
item.content:encoded:
Could we be fapping at an elaborate airbrushing job?

Does it really matter?

Scarlett Johansson-Langston is made of win.

item.title: By: Logan Young
item.dc:creator: Logan Young
item.description: Christie eleison - my fingers are now securely stuck to my keyboard. Thanks...I needed that.
item.content:encoded: Christie eleison – my fingers are now securely stuck to my keyboard. Thanks…I needed that.

item.description: jeebuz! Where did you find that image?!
